price: Muusaanis ni jedhe: “Rabbiin kiyya nama Isa biraa qajeelumaan dhufeefi nama booddeen ganda Aakiraa isaaf taatu beekaadha. miidhaa raawwattoonni hin milkaa’anu.”
arabic: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ رَبِّيٓ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَن جَآءَ بِٱلۡهُدَىٰ مِنۡ عِندِهِۦ وَمَن تَكُونُ لَهُۥ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلدَّارِۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفۡلِحُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waqāla mūsā rabbī aʿlamu biman jāa bil-hudā min ʿindihi waman takūnu lahu ʿāqibatu al-dāri innahu lā yuf'liḥu al-ẓālimūna
translations: the good end in the Hereafter
the good end in the Hereafter
